tool_description: This API is designed to provide authoritative National Park Service (NPS) data and content about parks and their facilities, events, news, alerts, and more.
name: National Park Service
title: National Park Service

api_list.name: People

optional_parameters.name: parkCode
optional_parameters.description: A comma delimited list of park codes (each 4-10 characters in length).

optional_parameters.name: stateCode
optional_parameters.description: A comma delimited list of 2 character state codes.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of results to return per request. Default is 50.

optional_parameters.name: start
optional_parameters.description: Get the next [limit] results starting with this number.

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description: Term to search on

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: A comma delimited list of resource properties to include in the JSON response in addition to the default properties. The available properties for each resource are listed in the documentation for each resource. Invalid property values will be ignored.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: A comma delimited list of resource properties to sort the results by. Each resource identifies which properties are 'sortable’. Ascending order is assumed for each property. If descending order is desired, the unary negative should prefix the property name. The sortable properties are listed in the documentation for each resource. Invalid property values will be ignored.

api_list.name: Events
api_list.description: Event data includes information about the date, time, fee, and description of events taking place in national parks.

api_list.name: Alerts
api_list.description: Alerts communicate information about hazardous, potentially hazardous, or changing conditions that may affect a visit to a national park. Alert data includes the type of alert, title, description, and optional link to additional information.

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: A comma delimited list of resource properties to include in the JSON response in addition to the default properties. The available properties for each resource are listed in the documentation for each resource. Invalid property values will be ignored.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of results to return per request. Default is 50.

optional_parameters.name: parkcode
optional_parameters.description: A comma delimited list of park codes (each 4-10 characters in length).

optional_parameters.description: Get the next [limit] results starting with this number.

optional_parameters.name: statecode
optional_parameters.description: A comma delimited list of 2 character state codes.

api_list.name: News Releases
api_list.description: News release data includes a title, abstract, and link to national park news releases, as well as an optional image.

api_list.name: Places
api_list.description: Places are shared content assets that are tagged so they can appear in a variety of places on NPS.gov. Data includes a title, image, short description of the content, and link to more information about the asset.

optional_parameters.name: parkCode
optional_parameters.description: A comma delimited list of park codes (each 4-10 characters in length).

optional_parameters.name: stateCode

api_list.name: Parks
api_list.description: Park basics data includes location, contact, operating hours, and entrance fee/pass information for each national park At least five photos of each park are also available.

optional_parameters.name: parkCode
optional_parameters.description: A comma delimited list of park codes (each 4-10 characters in length).

optional_parameters.name: stateCode
optional_parameters.description: A comma delimited list of 2 character state codes.

api_list.name: Visitor Centers
api_list.description: Visitor center data includes location, contact, and operating hours information for visitor centers and other visitor contact facilities in national parks At least one visitor center is listed for each park; some parks with multiple visitor centers may include information about more than one.

optional_parameters.description: A comma delimited list of park codes (each 4-10 characters in length).

api_list.name: Lesson Plans
api_list.description: Lesson plans are standards-based resources about national parks for teacher to use in their classrooms Lesson plan data includes objectives, grade level, subject, duration, and standards information.
